title: San Juan Island National Historical Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar        The Candlelight Ball is the highlight of the annual Encampment at English Camp. Visitors and re-enactors dance to 19th-century period music and celebrate the peaceful resolution of conflict. This year's Encampment is scheduled July 29-31 with the Candlelight Ball at 8 p.m., Saturday the 30th. Lynn Kesling           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 16 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      San Juan Island National Historical Park Young Hill/Royal Marine Cemetery Guided Hike      Time: 1:30 PM to 3:30 PM Location: Meet at the north end of the English Camp parking area. Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly  from 06/12/2016 to 08/21/2016 Serious hikers will enjoy this two-hour, ranger led hike up the south slope of 650-foot Young Hill. View Details      San Juan Island National Historical Park Contra Dancing at English Camp      Time: 7:30 PM to 9:00 PM Location: English Camp barracks Fees: Free     Monday, August 15, 2016 Every Monday Weekly  from 06/13/2016 to 08/22/2016 Singer and music historian Michael Cohen and local  musicians present an evening of traditional contra tunes and dancing for those wishing to take a turn on the superb wood floor of the nearly 150 year old Marine Barracks. View Details      San Juan Island National Historical Park Pig War Walk      Time: 1:30 PM to 2:30 PM Location: Meet at American Camp parking area. Fees: Free     Tuesday, August 16, 2016 Every Tuesday Weekly  from 06/14/2016 to 08/30/2016 Park staff will lead an easy and informative walk to the site of Belle Vue farm, the redoubt and the historic buildings at "Camp San Juan". View Details      San Juan Island National Historical Park Ranger's Choice      Time: 10:30 AM to 11:30 AM Location: Meet at the English Camp barracks Fees: Free     Tuesday, August 16, 2016 Every Tuesday Weekly  from 06/14/2016 to 08/30/2016 It's always something interesting when a ranger makes the program choice. View Details      San Juan Island National Historical Park Prairie Ecology Walk      Time: 10:30 AM to 11:30 AM Location: Meet at the American Camp visitor center parking lot Fees: Free     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Every Wednesday Weekly  from 07/06/2016 to 08/31/2016 Prairies are one of the rarest ecosystems in the country. Join park staff to learn about this unique part of the island and the wildlife and plants that call it home.  View Details      San Juan Island National Historical Park San Juan County Fair      Time: 10:00 AM to 9:00 PM Location: San Juan County Fair Grounds Fees: $14     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Go on a park-themed scavenger hunt, add something to the centennial time capsule and enjoy hands-on activities at the park booth. View Details      San Juan Island National Historical Park The Crook's of English Camp      Time: 1:30 PM to 2:30 PM Location: Meet at the English Camp parking lot Fees: Free     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Every Wednesday Weekly  from 06/15/2016 to 08/31/2016 Not a program about notorious smugglers, but the family that homesteaded English Camp in 1876. View Details      San Juan Island National Historical Park A Walk to the Salmon Bank      Time: 1:30 PM to 3:30 PM Location: Meet at the American Camp parking area Fees: Free     Thursday, August 18, 2016 Every Thursday Weekly  from 06/09/2016 to 09/01/2016 Accompany a park ranger or volunteer on this cross-prairie journey to the historic Salmon Bank at South Beach, where fresh-water springs attracted Indians and Europeans alike. This activity can be strenuous.  View Details      San Juan Island National Historical Park The View from Officer's Hill      Time: 10:30 AM to 11:30 AM Location: Meet at the English Camp barracks Fees: Free     Thursday, August 18, 2016 Every Thursday Weekly  from 06/16/2016 to 09/01/2016 The 1867 command change at English Camp brought a flurry of new building construction, including a new captain’s residence on Officer’s Hill. View Details      San Juan Island National Historical Park Jakle's Lagoon Nature Loop      Time: 10:30 AM to 11:30 AM Location: Meet at Jakle's Lagoon parking area. Fees: Free     Friday, August 19, 2016 Every Friday Weekly  from 06/17/2016 to 09/02/2016 Park staff will lead an easy walk on the Jakle's Lagoon nature loop. A great forest walk through the cool Douglas fir and cedar forest on a warm afternoon. View Details      San Juan Island National Historical Park Wildlife in the San Juan Islands      Time: 1:00 PM to 3:00 PM Location: English Camp barracks Fees: Free     Friday, August 19, 2016 Every Friday Weekly  from 06/10/2016 to 09/02/2016 Puzzled by an animal or bird? Wolf Hollow Wildlife Rehabilitation Center Education staff answer questions and use a variety of media to talk about wildlife in the San Juan Islands. View Details      San Juan Island National Historical Park Capt. Delacombe's English Camp Guided Walk      Time: 10:30 AM to 11:30 AM Location: English Camp barracks Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/18/2016 to 09/03/2016 Join park host Paul Kitchen and learn some of the stories of English Camp as your tour the grounds .   View Details      San Juan Island National Historical Park Drill, Drill and more Drill: Soldier Skills of the Joint Military Occupation of San Juan Island      Time: 12:00 PM to 3:00 PM Location: English Camp parade ground Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/18/2016 to 08/27/2016 Park rangers and volunteers recreate military and civilian camp life during the island’s early pioneer period.  Activities may include blacksmithing, woodworking, manual of arms, games, and washing clothes. View Details      San Juan Island National Historical Park The Army Culture of San Juan Island      Time: 12:00 PM to 3:00 PM Location: McRae House (HS 11) American Camp Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/18/2016 to 08/27/2016 Despite its remote location, the officers of Camp San Juan endeavored to maintain a decorum of civility at their temporary home. View Details      San Juan Island National Historical Park Centennial Celebration      Time: 2:00 PM to 6:00 PM Location: English Camp Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 National Park Service, Coast Salish and Straits People, and the Public will come together to honor our youth who are the Keepers of the Tradition and the Protectors of the Circle of Life. View Details      San Juan Island National Historical Park Interstellar Birthday Extravaganza      Time: 8:00 PM to 12:00 AM Location: TBD Fees: Free     Friday, September 9, 2016 Celebrate the Golden Anniversary of San Juan Island National Historical Park at this Birthday and Star Gazing Party.
